content: KWIK-Con+ Phillips countersunk flat head SS screw anchor Versatile, high-performance screw anchor for concrete and masonry (410 stainless steel, Phillips countersunk flat head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier and quicker installation with just one tool Durable design minimizes risk of head snaps Also available with TorxÂ® hex head for more secure driving and no bit slippage Matched tolerance carbide-tipped drill bits required when installing these screw anchors Applications Fastening to concrete, block, brick, and masonry Fastening window and door frames Installing electrical wall fixtures Installing handrails ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless steel, 410 Head configuration: Countersunk Phillips Bit size: PH3 Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, 410 | Head configuration | Countersunk Phillips | Approvals / Test reports | Miami Dade County | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (solid) | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | No | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Outdoor (more than 1km to coast) | Material composition | Steel, SS 410 ### ITEMS- 2260106 - Screw Anchor Kwik-Con+ 3/16x1-1/4 PFH SS410 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KC 3/16 x 1 1/4 PFH SS Concrete screw - 3654659 - KWIK-CON+ 3/16 x 1 1/4 PFH MC SS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x KC 3/16 x 1 1/4 PFH SS Concrete screw - 2260107 - Screw Anchor Kwik-Con+ 3/16x2-3/4 PFH SS410 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KC 3/16 x 2 3/4 PFH SS Concrete screw - 3654660 - KWIK-CON+ 3/16 x 2 3/4 PFH MC SS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x KC 3/16 x 2 3/4 PFH SS Concrete screw
